product_name: Klean Kanteen Vacuum-Insulated Canister - 8 fl. oz.
long_description: Use the Klean Kanteen Vacuum-Insulated canister to stock up on goodies at the bulk section of your local market or to head out on the trail with a hot lunch that you can enjoy atop the summit.
